tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_type VARCHAR(100),
    document_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE contracts (contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name STRING,
    party1_name STRING,
    party2_name STRING,
    contract_date TIMESTAMP,
    contract_body TEXT);

CREATE TABLE agreements (agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_name STRING,
    party1_name STRING,
    party2_name STRING,
    agreement_date TIMESTAMP,
    agreement_body TEXT);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE parties (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    contact VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE signatures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    party_id INT,
    contract_id INT,
    signed_on DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (party_id) REFERENCES parties(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES contracts(id)
)

CREATE TABLE contracts (
  contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  client_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT,
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE agreements (
  agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_id INT,
  client_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
